name: Crazy Hippo
description:
My name is Dmitry and I am a Unity Developer. I am grateful to my wife for the idea of creating a game about animals based on a real fact.

By the way, she helped me with the UI, and since she did it for the first time, please do not judge strictly.

We love animals very much and we hope this game will be a pleasant leisure for you and your children!

The game is based on a completely real fact.

Did you know that the hippo is a ferocious animal, every time someone tries to approach the reservoir, he aggressively drives it away from his territory?

Try yourself as a real "King" of Safari! 

Press, hold for the sight and go on the attack.

For each downed animal, you get from 1 to 5 points, which turn into an additional life in the form of small hippos.

But for each miss, the points will decrease, be careful, good luck!
